author: Simon Difford
description: Bergamot liqueur and quinine tonic combine harmoniously in this lightly bitter-sweet aperitivo. Mediterranean tonic water brings out attractive mellow herbal notes in the citrusy liqueur.
name: It & T
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass & briefly stir
